Round-robbin game statistics from the Western NBA conference during the 2014-2015 season.

A dataset of tensors containing pair-wise statistics between teams in the first half and second half of the 2014-2015 season. This dataset only contains statistics for the Western Conference of the National Basketball League (NBA).

west

Format

A list of tensors with the following elements:

west_array

A four-dimensional tensor. Element (i, j, k, l) contains the arc-sin transformed statistic k (k = free-throw proportion, two-point field goal proportion, or three-point field goal proportion) between team i and team j in either their first home (l = 1) or away (l = 2) game of the 2014-2015 season.

west_array_n

A four-dimensional tensor. Element (i, j, k, l) contains the number of attempts of k (k = free-throws, two-point field goals, or three-point field goals) between team i and team j in either their first home (l = 1) or away (l = 2) game of the 2014-2015 season.

west_array_sub

A four-dimensional tensor. Element (i, j, k, l) contains the number of made attempts of k (k = free-throws, two-point field goals, or three-point field goals) between team i and team j in either their first home (l = 1) or away (l = 2) game of the 2014-2015 season.

west_true_as

A four-dimensional tensor. Element (i, j, k, l) contains the arc-sin transformed statistic k (k = free-throw proportion, two-point field goal proportion, or three-point field goal proportion) between team i and team j in either their last home (l = 1) or away (l = 2) game of the 2014-2015 season.

west_true_p

A four-dimensional tensor. Element (i, j, k, l) contains statistic k (k = free-throw proportion, two-point field goal proportion, or three-point field goal proportion) between team i and team j in either their first home (l = 1) or away (l = 2) game of the 2014-2015 season.

Source

http://www.basketball-reference.com/
